name: 1l
title: Love
rules: Gain access to an engine that you do not own this turn. The owner gets +1
each time you use it. Use this ability no more than once a turn on each other player.

name: arrow01
title: Engine Core
rules: Place inputs to the left of this card and outputs to the right. If there are no inputs then this is an automatic engine.
